text: John Beveridge (1936-2016), was a male rower who competed for England. ==Rowing career== He represented England and won a gold medal in the coxless four and a bronze medal in the eights at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia. He rowed for the Molesey Boat Club. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2016 deaths Category:English male rowers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in rowing Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for England Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England Category:Rowers at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: John Beveridge (rower)
